titleStmt.title: An Inscription intended to be set up for the E--l of R---r, when by the happy effects of his ministry, the chappel of St. Stephen's is become a chappel to the Jesuites to the eternal memory of L--e E-l of R-r.
titleStmt.author: Rochester, Laurence Hyde, Earl of, 1641-1711.

notesStmt.note: "Translation of the L[aurence] H[yde]s speech, now the E. of R[ocheste]r, to the King of Poland, 1677": p. 6-8.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
